entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cowansville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:31 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
